metadata.title: CVE-2020-27752 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in MagickCore/quantum-private.h. Anattacker who submits a crafted file that is processed by ImageMagick couldtrigger a heap buffer overflow. This would most likely lead to an impact toapplication availability, but could potentially lead to an impact to dataintegrity as well. This flaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to 7.0.9-0.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
